i1.name: Voracity
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy champions within 3 seconds of being damaged by '''Katarina''' reduce her [[champion ability|abilities']] '''current''' {{sti|cooldowns}} by 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Innate - Sinister Steel:}} Whenever '''Katarina''' retrieves a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing {{pp|68;72;77;82;89;96;103;112;121;131;142;154;166;180;194;208;224;240|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|55 to 88 for 4|1 to 16}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit, as well as reducing {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina|Shunpo's}} '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|key=%|78 to 96 for 4|1 to 16}}.
{{as|Daggers|buzzword}} will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Takedowns on enemy champions within 3 seconds of being damaged by Katarina reduce her champion ability current cooldowns by 15 seconds.
Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68;72;77;82;89;96;103;112;121;131;142;154;166;180;194;208;224;240undefined − (based on level) (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 1 to 16 ‒ undefined AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy champions hit, as well as reducing Shunpo's current cooldown by 1 to 16 ‒ undefined.
Daggers will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Voracity's'' cooldown reduction will still take effect even after '''Katarina''' dies.
* The {{as|Dagger's|buzzword}} area of effect indicator is displayed even before it lands, although '''Katarina''' may not slash until it has. This can be targeted by {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}.
* {{as|Daggers|buzzword}} will still deal damage but not apply on-hit effects if {{tip|dodged}}. They cannot be {{tip|block|blocked}} nor can they be missed while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* Single-use on-hit effects, such as {{tip|Spellblade}}, will apply to the closest target to '''Katarina''' when she uses a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}.

q1.name: Bouncing Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' throws a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} at the target enemy that upon arrival bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to each target.
The {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} then lands onto the ground after 1 second, 350 units opposite from where it struck its last target.
''The {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} bounces to targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that upon arrival bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to each target.
The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, 350 units opposite from where it struck its last target.
The Dagger bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them or not.
q1.notes: * ''Bouncing Blade'' will not be destroyed in-flight if the target dies before reaching them but it will on {{tip|clone|clones}} that expire.

w1.name: Preparation
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' tosses a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} into the air above her current location and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays until it lands after {{fd|1.25}} seconds as well as {{tip|ghosting}} for the same duration.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds as well as ghosting for the same duration.

e1.name: Shunpo
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' {{tip|blinks}} to the target location around the target unit or {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy in range and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
''Upon blinking, '''Katarina''' remains unable to act via a cast time for {{fd|0.15}} seconds.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer.
Upon blinking, Katarina remains unable to act via a cast time for 0.15 seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Shunpo'' can be used on any unit except [[structures]] and {{tip|wards}}.
* If '''Katarina''' ''Shunpo's'' on an ally, any attack command she is given during its cast time will be negated, and every movement command will be delayed by 1 second (starting at the start of the cast time).
* ''Shunpo'' should be an instant ability but it has extra logic to consider which makes it have a short cast time before blinking.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during cast time but it will not cancel the blink.
* If the target is very close to a wall and '''Katarina''' targets ''Shunpo'' behind the target, she can blink over the wall.
* ''Shunpo''  will still deal damage but not apply on-hit effects if {{tip|dodged}}. It cannot be {{tip|block|blocked}} nor can it be missed while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
{{ct|cast}}

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% AD) (+ 25% AP)

r1.name: Death Lotus
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, rapidly spinning in place to throw a dagger every {{fd|0.166}} seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}. Each dagger deals {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|magic damage}}, applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects, and inflicts 60% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} on the target for 3 seconds.
''A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be thrown at.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Katarina channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly spinning in place to throw a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions. Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-hit and on-attack effects, and inflicts 60% Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.
A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be thrown at.
r1.notes:
* An alternate way of writing the formula for the '''bonus AD''' ratio is {{as|16%|attack damage}} {{times}} (1 + {{as|0.8 '''total''' attack speed}}) {{as|'''bonus''' AD}}.
** At level 6, '''Katarina''' has a minimum of 0.729 attack speed (bar potential reduction from {{tip|cripple|attack speed slows}}).
*** The minimum physical damage per dagger is {{as|25.33% bonus AD}}.
* ''Death Lotus'' will not end if no enemies remain in range.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block and be consumed by only one dagger.
* Each dagger counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Katarina''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|cast=interrupts|move=Disabled in the first and last {{fd|0.25}} seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts.|attack=Disabled in the first and last {{fd|0.25}} seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts.|items=interrupts,true,,false,,false,false,false,melee|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,false,false}}
* Trying to cast a disabled active (excluding {{ii|Hextech Rocketbelt}}) will buffer it to cast at the completion of the channel.
